alert.note: Alert for Pawnee; Richardson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 11:35PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Richardson and eastern Pawnee Counties through MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1134 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 3 miles west of Pawnee City, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Pawnee City around 1140 PM CDT. Table Rock around 1145 PM CDT. Du Bois around 1150 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Humboldt and Dawson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
